title.narrative: MIDAS: Mitigating Impacts of Drought on Agriculture livelihoods and food Security

description.narrative: The main objective of this project is to protect the agriculture livelihoods of vulnerable marginal farming households from the adverse impacts of ongoing drought, COVID-19 and other recent shocks and worsening of existing food crisis in Afghanistan. This FAO project provides a winter wheat production package comprising 50 Kg. of certified wheat seeds along with 50 Kg. each of Urea and DAP fertilizer to vulnerable marginal farmers among other activities. The project provides life-saving assistance to 84,000 people, including 16,000 women, 16,750 men, 50,000 children, and 2,270 persons with disabilities.
